name: Gone Fishing!
description:
* An Apple Watch is required to play this game!

- So, you're in a boring meeting or getting ready to get on a plane... Better yet, you just need to get away for a minute. You're in luck. Gone Fishing! for the Apple Watch has arrived!

Features include:

- solid 8 bit graphics
- simple tap controls for casting and catching
- cool animations
- high score storage
- time displayed
- first real reflex based action fishing game for apple watch
